palette-description: This palette evokes a sense of high-end comfort and timeless style. The combination of muted pastels and grounded neutrals makes it ideal for luxury apparel brands, organic skincare, or minimalist lifestyle blogs.
color-description: Deep grounded neutral for text and high contrast.
